heisig_chinese_memo: A smidgen of misbehavior around the taskmaster results in your computer being thrown off a cliff and you running after the taskmaster trying to explain yourself yelling "Not yet! Don't throw it yet! Let me explain!"
chinese_mnemonics_deck__story: I threw my computer off a cliff because it kept crashing and I didn't care even a smidgen for it.
humanum_full_description_en:
The first essay of " Li " is " 𠩺 ", and " 𠩺 " always sounds, from the sorrow to the people, like the shape of holding a stick to beat the wheat, a good harvest and enough food is a blessing, and it has the meaning of well-being. "Said Wen": "Li, family portrait. From here, 𠩺 sound."

Bronze plus from " inside " as the sound character, " PCT " is " 𠩺 newcomer word" of. 𠩺, Lijia inscriptions from " come ", inscriptions from wood, to Xiaozhuan never written. See " 𠩺 ".

Bronze inscription expresses well-being, and Bangui: "Pei Xianyu, the emperor, received the Jingzong Yili", which means the blessing of the Jingzong. It means to give, and the classics are also called " Lai ", and many friends: "Li Nv (Ru) Yi (Gi) Nv (Ru) Tutian". "book. The Life of the Marquis of Wen": "Using Lai Erqi and Yi Jiao", "Poetry. Daya. "Jiang Han": "Li Er Gui Zan, Zi Yan Yi Mao." Also used as the name of a person and a country.
humanum_short_description_en: The first essay of " Li " is " 𠩺 ", and " 𠩺 " has always been heard, from the beginning to the other, like the shape of holding a stick to beat the wheat. A harvest and enough food is a blessing, and it implies well-being.
humanum_full_description:
「釐」的初文作「𠩺」，「𠩺」從來聲，從攴從人從又，象以手持杖打麥之形，豐收足食即為有福，引申有福祉之意。《說文》：「釐，家福也。从里，𠩺聲。」

　　金文加從「里」為聲符，「釐」是「𠩺」的後起字。𠩺、釐甲金文從「來」，金文或從木，至小篆訛作從未。參見「𠩺」。

　　金文表示福祉，班簋：「丕顯丮皇公，受京宗懿釐」，意謂受京宗福蔭。表示賜予，典籍亦作「賚」，多友鼎：「釐女(汝)易(賜)女(汝)土田」。《書．文侯之命》：「用賚爾秬鬯一卣」，《詩．大雅．江漢》：「釐爾圭瓚，秬鬯一卣。」又用作人名、國名。
humanum_short_description: 「釐」的初文作「𠩺」，「𠩺」從來聲，從攴從人從又，象以手持杖打麥之形，豐收足食即為有福，引申有福祉之意。

(Simplified: 厘)
Chinese Definition:
Pictophonetic: 厘 indicates the sound; 里 (unit) conveys the meaning.
  • ⿱ Above to below
    • 厘 [ lí ] one thousandth
①小數名，百分之一：釐米。
②單位名(ａ．長度單位，中國一市尺的千分之一；b．重量單位，中國一市兩的千分之一；c．地積單位，中國一市畝的百分之一；d．利率單位，年利一釐按百分之一計，月利一釐按千分之一計)。
③治理，整理：釐正(訂正)。釐革(調整改革)。
④古同“嫠”，寡婦。

釐米 [ lí mǐ ]: centimeter; also written 厘米

釐字的基本解释

釐
lí
同“厘”。

釐
xǐ
古同“禧”，吉祥。

釐
xī
古同“僖”，用作谥号。

釐字的汉语字典释义

[①]［lí］
［《廣韻》里之切，平之，來。］
“氂2”的今字。亦作“1”。
(1)治理；处理。
(2)改变；改正。
(3)分，分开。
(4)事物的条理。
(5)厘金的略称。
(6)数量单位。用于长度，为尺的千分之一。
(7)数量单位。用于重量，为旧制两的千分之一。
(8)数量单位。用于地积，为亩的百分之一。
(9)数量单位。用于利率：年利一厘为本金的百分之一，月利为本金的千分之一。
(10)微小。参见“釐毫”、“毫釐”。
(11)古地名。春秋楚邑。故址在今安徽省无为县境。
(12)通“嫠”。寡妇。
(13)通“來”。参见“釐麰”。
[②]［xī］
［《集韻》虚其切，平之，曉。］
(1)福。
(2)胙肉，祭鬼神后的福食。
(3)姓。
[③]［lài］
［《集韻》落蓋切，去夳，來。］
通“賚1”。
赐予。

釐字的康熙字典解释

【酉集下】【里字部】　釐； 康熙笔画：18； 页码：页1292第10
〔古文〕?【廣韻】【集韻】里之切【韻會】陵之切，?音離。【廣韻】理也。【書·堯典】釐降二女于嬀汭。【疏】釐降，謂能以義理下之。【揚雄·劇秦美新】荷天衢，提地釐。【註】釐，理也。荷天道，提地理，言則而效之。　又【說文】家福也。【揚雄·甘泉賦】逆釐三神。【註】釐，福也。　又治也。【書·堯典】允釐百工，庶績咸熙。【傳】釐，治也。　又數名。與?、氂?同。【前漢·東方朔傳】正其本，萬事理，失之毫釐，差以千里。【淮南子·主術訓】是故審毫釐之計者，必遺天下之大數。　又【揚子·方言】?楚之閒，凡人獸乳而雙產，謂之釐孳。　又【博雅】耦也。　又【揚子·方言】釐㙁，貪也。　又賜也，予也。【詩·大雅】其僕維何，釐爾女士。【傳】釐，予也。【又】釐爾圭瓚。【傳】釐，賜也。　又山名。【山海經】釐山。【註】按《名勝志》釐山在嵩縣西。　又草名。【爾雅·釋草】釐，蔓華。本作釐。俗从牙作?。　又陟釐，紙名。【正字通】海藻本名陟釐。南越以海苔爲紙，其理倒側，故名側理紙。　又姓。【山海

Centi
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①] [lí]
[The cut in "Guangyun", the level, come. ]
The modern word for "Yak 2". Also called "1".
(1) Governance; treatment.
(2) Change; correct.
(3) Divide, separate.
(4) The organization of things.
(5) Abbreviation for Lijin.
(6) Quantity unit. Used for length, one thousandth of a ruler.
(7) Quantity unit. Used for weight, it is one-thousandth of the old system.
(8) Quantity unit. Used for plots, one percent of acres.
(9) Quantity unit. Used for interest rate: annual interest is one percent of principal and monthly interest is one thousandth of principal.
(10) Tiny. See "centi", "milli".
(11) Ancient place names. Chunqiu Chuyi. It was located in Wuwei County, Anhui Province today.
(12) Through "嫠". widow.
(13) Through "come". See "li 麰".
[②]［xī］
["Jiyun" is imaginary and cut, flat, and Xiao. ]
(1) Fu.
(2) Glucose meat, a blessing after offering sacrifices to ghosts and gods.
(3) Last name.
[③]［lài］
["Jiyun" Go to Gaiqie, go to Qiao, come. ]
Same as "Lai 1".
Bestowed.
